attributes.additional_details:
In today's remarks (11th of January), the Government Press Secretary stated there is no demand for after 8PM vaccinations. (link to statement: https://bit.ly/3nDSRUS ). However, social media indicates that the opposite might be true: https://bit.ly/2LDN1pe

However, vaccinating as many people as possible as soon as possible is paramount to saving lives, relieving pressure from the NHS, opening up the economy and returning to normalcy. It is shocking that we are not vaccinating around the clock.
attributes.background: Every effort must be made to make the vaccination process as fast as possible, including opening up round the clock vaccination centres.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
